    This class represents the presentation of a red traffic light warning.

    Constructors in eu.opends.hmi with parameters of type PresentationModel
    Constructor Description
    HMIThread​(SimulationBasics sim, PresentationModel presentationModel, java.lang.String triggerID, long presentationID)
    Creates a new HMI update thread that updates a presentation task every time, a parameter has changed (at most 10 times a second).
